info.task: decrement a slider thumb to the minimum value
info.title: Decrement a slider thumb to the minimum value in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSlider
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first slider thumb

user: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 0.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 0.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
